Package net.realmproject.dcm.command

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command  
    CommandDevice<T extends DeviceState>
    Building on top of the Device component, a CommandDevice accepts values of type Command and returns values of type T.

    Methods annotated with the CommandMethod interface will be detected automatically, and commands with an action field matching the method name (or CommandMethod annotation value) will automatically be routed to the corresponding method.

    CommandMethods may accept 0 or 1 arguments.
    DeviceState
    Base class for CommandDevices to report their device state
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeviceState.Mode  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CommandMethod
    Indicates that a method in a CommandDevice is meant to process Commands from received events.
